law.catch_line: Department may establish facilities for manufacture of products for use of governmental agencies.
law.text: The department may purchase in the manner provided by law, equipment, raw materials, and supplies, and employ the supervisory personnel necessary to establish and maintain, industries at the penitentiary or any penal farm or institution of the department, for the purpose of utilizing the services of prisoners in the manufacture or production of articles or products, including license plates, road signs, and other articles and products needed for the construction, operation, maintenance, or use of any office, department, institution, or agency supported in whole or in part by this state or its political subdivisions.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 57, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 24(14). -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 1.
